title: Louis W. Bowen Scenic Views
description: The designs depict panoramas and perspectives.  Each is a miniature of the full-scale scenic mural.  Each is printed in sepia tones.  The cover image is a detail from "Bay of Naples". The scenes include: "Bay of Naples", "Venetian Scenes", "La Reggia", "Paris 1830", "Piemontese", "The Emperor's Horses", "Monte Capitolino", "The Grand Canal", "The Roman Forum", "Rotunda" and "Italian Street Scene".
name: Sample book
